text: Sigoulès-et-Flaugeac is a commune in the Dordogne department in Nouvelle- Aquitaine in southwestern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Sigoulès (the seat) and Flaugeac.Arrêté préfectoral 6 November 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Dordogne department ==References== Category:Communes of Dordogne
title: Sigoulès-et-Flaugeac
